# Battle of Sevastopol (1918)

| combatant2        = Bolsheviks
| partof            = the Crimean Operation (1918)
| commander1        =  Robert von Kosch  Petro Bolbochan
| commander2        = Unknown
| units1            = German 15th DivisionZaporozhian Corps
| units2            = Unknown
| image             = German troops at Sevastopol (1918).jpg
| caption           = German troops looking at newly captured Russian ships in Sevastopol
}}
The Battle of Sevastopol (1918) took place during the Crimean Operation of World War I.
